module: Module-level comment: The 'dflancb' module detects falling edges on the 'in' signal synchronized to 'clk'. Utilizes a register 'anterior' to remember the last state of 'in'. On the rising edge of 'clk', 'anterior' updates unless 'reset' is high, resetting it to 0. Falling edges are detected when 'anterior' is high and 'in' is low, setting 'flanc' high to indicate the transition.
